original: COLLIN, Eric, Direktör, Ljusdal, f Järvsö, Gävleb l, 8/2 78, gm Maria Gyllenram. Ch f fma Collins Manufaktur AB, Ljusdal. Collins Manuf AB grund av O E Collin i Järvsö 74, överflytt t Ljusdal 01 o blev fam.-bol 34.
translated: COLLIN, Eric, Director, Ljusdal, born in Järvsö, Gävleborg county, on February 8th, 1878, married to Maria Gyllenram. Chief executive of Collins Manufaktur AB, Ljusdal. Collins Manuf AB was founded by O E Collin in Järvsö in 1874, transferred to Ljusdal in 1901, and became a family business in 1934.

transferTo.name: Transfer of Collins Manufaktur AB to Ljusdal

becameFamilyBusiness.name: Collins Manufaktur AB becomes a family business
